mapper.select: select art.ID_ as id, art.REV_ as version, art.EXECUTION_ID_ as executionId, art.PROC_INST_ID_ as actInstanceId, art.PROC_DEF_ID_ as processDefinitionId, art.NAME_ as name, art.PARENT_TASK_ID_ as parentTaskId, art.DESCRIPTION_ as description, art.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskDefinitionKey, art.OWNER_ as owner, art.ASSIGNEE_ as assignee, art.DELEGATION_ as delegationState, art.PRIORITY_ as priority, art.CREATE_TIME_ as createDate, art.DUE_DATE_ as dueDate, art.CATEGORY_ as category, art.SUSPENSION_STATE_ as suspended, art.TENANT_ID_ as tenantId, art.FORM_KEY_ as formKey, pd.name as processDefinitionName, pd.graphResId as graphResId, pd.id as processDefId, pd.actDefId as deploymentId, pi.title as title, pe.taskType as taskType, pi.id as instanceId, pe.parentId as parentId, pe.endTask as endTask, tlt.fromTaskKey as fromTaskKey, tlt.fromTaskType as fromTaskType, tlt.fromTaskId as fromTaskId, tlt.fromTaskAssignee as fromTaskAssignee from ACT_RU_TASK art left join PROCESSDEF pd on art.PROC_DEF_ID_=pd.actDefId left join ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK ari on art.ID_=ari.TASK_ID_ left join ProcessDefInstance pi on art.PROC_INST_ID_=pi.actInstanceId left join PROCESSELEMENT pe on art.TASK_DEF_KEY_=pe.taskKey left join TASKLINKTASK tlt on art.ID_=tlt.currentTaskId where pe.processDefId=pd.id and ari.USER_ID_=#{userId} and art.ASSIGNEE_ is null and (pd.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}), '%') or art.NAME_ like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}), '%')) order by art.CREATE_TIME_ desc

select art.ID_ as id, art.REV_ as version, art.EXECUTION_ID_ as executionId, art.PROC_INST_ID_ as actInstanceId, art.PROC_DEF_ID_ as processDefinitionId, art.NAME_ as name, art.PARENT_TASK_ID_ as parentTaskId, art.DESCRIPTION_ as description, art.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskDefinitionKey, art.OWNER_ as owner, art.ASSIGNEE_ as assignee, art.DELEGATION_ as delegationState, art.PRIORITY_ as priority, art.CREATE_TIME_ as createDate, art.DUE_DATE_ as dueDate, art.CATEGORY_ as category, art.SUSPENSION_STATE_ as suspended, art.TENANT_ID_ as tenantId, art.FORM_KEY_ as formKey, pd.name as processDefinitionName, pd.graphResId as graphResId, pd.id as processDefId, pd.actDefId as deploymentId, pi.title as title, pe.taskType as taskType, pi.id as instanceId, pe.parentId as parentId, pe.endTask as endTask, tlt.fromTaskKey as fromTaskKey, tlt.fromTaskType as fromTaskType, tlt.fromTaskId as fromTaskId, tlt.fromTaskAssignee as fromTaskAssignee from ACT_RU_TASK art left join PROCESSDEF pd on art.PROC_DEF_ID_=pd.actDefId left join PROCESSDEFINSTANCE pi on art.PROC_INST_ID_=pi.actInstanceId left join PROCESSELEMENT pe on art.TASK_DEF_KEY_=pe.taskKey left join TASKLINKTASK tlt on art.ID_=tlt.currentTaskId where pe.processDefId=pd.id and art.ASSIGNEE_=#{userId} and (pd.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}), '%') or art.NAME_ like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}), '%')) order by art.CREATE_TIME_ desc

select art.ID_ as id, art.REV_ as version, art.EXECUTION_ID_ as executionId, art.PROC_INST_ID_ as actInstanceId, art.PROC_DEF_ID_ as processDefinitionId, art.NAME_ as name, art.PARENT_TASK_ID_ as parentTaskId, art.DESCRIPTION_ as description, art.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskDefinitionKey, art.OWNER_ as owner, art.ASSIGNEE_ as assignee, art.DELEGATION_ as delegationState, art.PRIORITY_ as priority, art.CREATE_TIME_ as createDate, art.DUE_DATE_ as dueDate, art.CATEGORY_ as category, art.SUSPENSION_STATE_ as suspended, art.TENANT_ID_ as tenantId, art.FORM_KEY_ as formKey, pd.name as processDefinitionName, pd.graphResId as graphResId, pd.id as processDefId, pd.actDefId as deploymentId, pi.title as title, pi.id as instanceId, pe.taskType as taskType, pe.preTaskKeys as preTaskKeys, pe.nextTaskKeys as nextTaskKeys, pe.parentId as parentId, pe.endTask as endTask, tlt.fromTaskKey as fromTaskKey, tlt.fromTaskType as fromTaskType, tlt.fromTaskId as fromTaskId, tlt.fromTaskAssignee as fromTaskAssignee from ACT_RU_TASK art left join ACT_HI_TASKINST aht on aht.PROC_INST_ID_=art.PROC_INST_ID_ left join PROCESSDEF pd on art.PROC_DEF_ID_=pd.actDefId left join PROCESSDEFINSTANCE pi on art.PROC_INST_ID_=pi.actInstanceId left join PROCESSELEMENT pe on art.TASK_DEF_KEY_=pe.taskKey left join TASKLINKTASK tlt on art.ID_=tlt.currentTaskId where pe.processDefId=pd.id and art.ASSIGNEE_ is null and aht.ASSIGNEE_=#{userId} and pe.taskType!='Countersign' and tlt.fromTaskType!='Countersign' and pi.title like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{title}), '%') and pd.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{processDefinitionName}), '%') and art.CREATE_TIME_ > #{startTime} and art.CREATE_TIME_ < #{endTime} order by art.CREATE_TIME_ desc

select count(*) from ACT_RU_TASK art left join ACT_HI_TASKINST aht on aht.PROC_INST_ID_=art.PROC_INST_ID_ left join PROCESSDEF pd on art.PROC_DEF_ID_=pd.actDefId left join PROCESSDEFINSTANCE pi on art.PROC_INST_ID_=pi.actInstanceId left join PROCESSELEMENT pe on art.TASK_DEF_KEY_=pe.taskKey left join TASKLINKTASK tlt on art.ID_=tlt.currentTaskId where pe.processDefId=pd.id and art.ASSIGNEE_ is null and aht.ASSIGNEE_=#{userId} and pe.taskType!='Countersign' and tlt.fromTaskType!='Countersign' and pi.title like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{title}), '%') and pd.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{processDefinitionName}), '%') and art.CREATE_TIME_ > #{startTime} and art.CREATE_TIME_ < #{endTime}

select art.ID_ as id, art.REV_ as version, art.EXECUTION_ID_ as executionId, art.PROC_INST_ID_ as actInstanceId, art.PROC_DEF_ID_ as processDefinitionId, art.NAME_ as name, art.PARENT_TASK_ID_ as parentTaskId, art.DESCRIPTION_ as description, art.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskDefinitionKey, art.OWNER_ as owner, art.ASSIGNEE_ as assignee, art.DELEGATION_ as delegationState, art.PRIORITY_ as priority, art.CREATE_TIME_ as createDate, art.DUE_DATE_ as dueDate, art.CATEGORY_ as category, art.SUSPENSION_STATE_ as suspended, art.TENANT_ID_ as tenantId, art.FORM_KEY_ as formKey from ACT_RU_TASK art where art.PROC_INST_ID_=#{instanceId}
